features.title: Features
features.subtitle: All the models you will need
features.description: Vezi provides lightning fast access to the most popular Large Language Models and an affordable price.
features.threepointfive: An upgrade to the GPT-3.5 language model, boasts increased accuracy in following instructions and formatting responses. This allows for fine-tuning the model's tone and handling double the data, making it a powerful tool for developers and businesses seeking precise and efficient AI applications.
features.fourpointo: OpenAI's GPT-4 is a cutting-edge multimodal language model, meaning it can process both text and images. This powerhouse goes beyond GPT-3.5, tackling professional tasks like writing legal documents or summarizing complex visuals. It even understands user prompts to adjust its tone and offers creative collaboration on writing projects.
features.muchmore: and even more, including variations for gpt-3.5 and four; such as gpt-4-32k or gpt-3.5-turbo-16k. For the full list of models check out https://veziapp.co/v1/models
